summary: This is an email from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, dated August 6, 2019, indicating plans to move forward with a search of Jeffrey Epstein's island, potentially as early as that weekend.

events.title: Planned Search of Epstein's Island
events.description: The United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York announces plans to conduct a search of Jeffrey Epstein's island, potentially as early as the weekend of August 10-11, 2019.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY (United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York)
keyFacts: The United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was planning a search of Jeffrey Epstein's island in August 2019.
The search was potentially scheduled for the weekend of August 10-11, 2019.
The email originated from the U.S. Attorney's Office at 1 St. Andrew's Plaza in New York.
The document indicates active investigative steps were being taken regarding Epstein's properties shortly before his death.
